Detailed Description

Value::Point

	Usage: $pt = Point("(3,6)"); # preferred
	       or $pt = Point(3,6);
	       or $pt = Point([3,6]);
	       ANS($pt->cmp());
		compareOptions:
		  showTypeWarnings => 1,   # warns if student response is of incorrect type
		  showEqualErrors  => 1,
		  ignoreStrings    => 1,
		  showDimensionHints => 1, # reports incorrect number of coordinates
		  showCoordinateHints =>1, # flags individual coordinates that are incorrect

public method Value::String::cmp (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in cmp: 14
sub cmp {
  my $self = shift;
  my $cmp = $self->SUPER::cmp(@_);
  if ($self->value =~ m/^\s*$/) {
    $cmp->install_pre_filter('erase');
    $cmp->install_pre_filter(sub {
      my $ans = shift;
      $ans->{student_ans} =~ s/^\s+//g;
      $ans->{student_ans} =~ s/\s+$//g;
      return $ans;
    });
  }
  return $cmp;
}

public method Value::String::cmp_class (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in cmp_class: 5
sub cmp_class {
  my $self = shift; my $ans = shift; my $typeMatch = $ans->{typeMatch};
  return 'a Word' if !Value::isValue($typeMatch) || $typeMatch->classMatch('String');
  return $typeMatch->cmp_class;
};

Reimplemented from Value.

public method Value::String::compare (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in compare: 5
sub compare {
  my ($self,$l,$r) = Value::checkOpOrderWithPromote(@_);
  return $l->value cmp $r->value if $l->{caseSensitive} || $r->{caseSensitive};
  return uc($l->value) cmp uc($r->value);
}

public method Value::String::new (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in new: 17
sub new {
  my $self = shift; my $class = ref($self) || $self;
  my $context = (Value::isContext($_[0]) ? shift : $self->context);
  my $x = join('',@_);
  my $s = bless {data => [$x], context => $context}, $class;
  if ($Parser::installed && !($x eq '' && $self->getFlag('allowEmptyStrings'))) {
    my $strings = $context->{strings};
    if (!$strings->{$x}) {
      my $X = $strings->{uc($x)};
      Value::Error("String constant '%s' is not defined in this context",$x)
        unless $X && !$X->{caseSensitive};
      $x = uc($x); while ($strings->{$x}{alias}) {$x = $strings->{$x}{alias}}
    }
    $s->{caseSensitive} = 1 if $strings->{$x}{caseSensitive};
  }
  return $s;
}

public method Value::String::promote (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in promote: 9
sub promote {
  my $self = shift;
  my $context = (Value::isContext($_[0]) ? shift : $self->context);
  my $x = (scalar(@_) ? shift : $self); $x = [$x,@_] if scalar(@_) > 0;
  $x = Value::makeValue($x,showError=>1,context=>$context);
  $x = join('',@{$x}) if ref($x) eq 'ARRAY';
  $x = $self->make($context,$x) unless Value::isValue($x);
  return $x;
}

public method Value::String::typeMatch (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in typeMatch: 8
sub typeMatch {
  my $self = shift; my $other = shift; my $ans = shift;
  my $typeMatch = $ans->{typeMatch};
  return &$typeMatch($other,$ans) if ref($typeMatch) eq 'CODE';
  return 1 if !Value::isValue($typeMatch) || $typeMatch->classMatch('String') ||
                 $self->type eq $other->type;
  return $typeMatch->typeMatch($other,$ans);
}

Reimplemented from Value.
